amendment.description: To provide for a study on making prescription pharmaceutical information accessible for blind and visually-impaired individuals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1015 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1015 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S8647) To provide for a study on making prescription pharmaceutical information accessible for blind and visually-impaired individuals.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1015 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1015 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
